charges.charge_description: 21:846 - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE (A schedule II controlled substance - methamphetamine)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to BOP for 60 months on each count of the Indictment to be served concurrently - Supervised Release for 4 years on each count of the Indictment, to be served concurrently - Special Assessment fee of $200.00.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to BOP for 60 months on each count of the Indictment to be served concurrently - Supervised Release for 4 years on each count of the Indictment, to be served concurrently - Special Assessment fee of $200.00.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to BOP for 60 months on Count 1 to run concurrently with Count 2 - Defendant on supervised release for 60 months on Count 1 to run concurrently with Count 2 - $100 special assessment
